resources.string: Map Icons: Maps Icon Collection https://mapicons.mapsmarker.com

This map of Cork City features prominent car parks and bicycle stations around the main city area and provides information about them.

For car parks you can find the amount of free parking spaces, cost to park there, and opening hours. 
For bicycle stations, you can find how many bikes or bike stands are available.

Time on popups tells when the information was last updated, and can be refreshed via the menu button.
Pinch the map to zoom in/out and twist to rotate. Move two fingers up/down the screen to pitch the map. The map\'s orientation can be reset by tapping the compass icon that appears in the top right.
- Indicates a cluster of markers.\n- The number represents how many markers are in that area.

Map: © Mapbox, © OpenStreetMap contributors

Design based off the Cork Dashboard http://www.corkdashboard.ie
Twitter: https://twitter.com/dashbuild
E-mail: dashboards@mu.ie

We gratefully acknowledge funding from Science Foundation Ireland under the Investigators' Award Programme. Award number 15/IA/3090
Tap these icons to see info!
Zoom into these to see more points on the map!
